error.server_error_sms_timeout: Requested new SMS code too early
error.authentication_error: Authentication error! This might be due to bad credentials or server connectivity issues.
error.otp_token_expired: Confirmation token expired. Please, request a new one by pressing "Next".

user.description:
Enter your credentials for the PIK Comfort app.

Auth token is optional. Unless it is provided, you will be required to enter requested SMS OTP token at the next step.
user.title: Authorization

Code will expire after {will_expire_at}.
